price: 73. Then it will be said to them: "Where are (all) those whom you used to join in worship as partners[4]
arabic: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: thumma qīla lahum ayna mā kuntum tush'rikūna
